column4: I'm using conky in Jaunty and I'd like to fetch the CPU temperature. What can I do to accomplish this?
lm-sensors .. install that package and read this :: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/SensorInstallHowto
once you have your sensors up and running read this :: http://conky.sourceforge.net/config_settings.html  also there is a #conky channel
good luck, i am a fan of conky also. very nice application.
Yeah, I replaced GKRELLm with conky and am very happy
thanks for the conky heads up.
use tee.. echo stuff | sudo tee -a file
no need to sudo the echo.
